data.comment: Angel Montoro (Granada) is not on the pitch at the moment but still receives a yellow card.
The big names in today's match at Wanda Metropolitano have now been confirmed.
The match is underway at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 1, Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the home team a throw-in.
Throw-in for Granada at Wanda Metropolitano.
Throw-in Granada.
In the minute 3, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Atletico throw-in in Granada's half.
Joao Felix (Atletico) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Can Atletico capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Granada's half?
In the minute 5, Atletico's Koke misses with an attempt on goal.
Granada have a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
In the minute 7, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Throw-in for Atletico in the half of Granada.
Goal kick for Granada at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 8, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Granada a goal kick.
Goal! Atletico have taken a 1-0 lead courtesy of a header from Diego Costa.
In the minute 9, That's a fine assist from Angel Correa.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Ball safe as Atletico is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 12, Throw-in for Granada in their own half.
Can Atletico get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Granada's half?
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
In the minute 15, Atletico have been awarded a penalty...
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 15, Can Atletico capitalize from this dangerous free kick?
At Wanda Metropolitano, Domingos Duarte has been yellow-carded for the away team.
A massive blow for Atletico as Saul Niguez misses from the spot.
Saul Niguez for Atletico gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 17, It's a goal kick for the away team in Madrid.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
In the minute 18, Goal kick for Granada at Wanda Metropolitano.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 19, Free kick for Granada in the half of Atletico.
Robert Kenedy (Granada) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 22, Atletico awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Atletico have a goal kick.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
Atleticoâ€™s Felipe is on his feet again at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 25, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Felipe.
Free kick Atletico.
In the minute 26, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Granada in their own half.
Atletico's Joao Felix has been booked in Madrid.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Granada.
In the minute 29, Robert Kenedy of Granada gets in a strike, but is off target.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Atletico a goal kick.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Atletico to take a throw-in in Granada territory.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 32, Throw-in high up the field for Granada in Madrid.
Free kick for Atletico in the half of Granada.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Madrid.
In the minute 35, Throw-in Granada.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Can Granada get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atletico's half?
In the minute 37, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Granada.
Victor Diaz (Granada) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Atletico defenders.
Corner awarded to Granada.
In the minute 39, Atletico's Saul Niguez gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Granada defender.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
Free kick Atletico.
In the minute 42, Free kick Atletico.
Yannick Carrasco is writhing in pain and play has been suspended for a few moments.
Yannick Carrasco for Atletico is back on the field again.
In the minute 45, In Madrid Granada drive forward through Yangel Herrera. His shot is on target but it's saved.
3 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico.
In the minute 45, At Wanda Metropolitano, Atletico are penalized for being offside.
Diego Costa for Atletico drives towards goal at Wanda Metropolitano. But the finish is unsuccessful.
Atletico have been awarded a corner by Xavier Estrada Fernandez.
In the minute 45, The first-half has ended.
The whistle has gone to start the second-half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 47, It's now 2-0 in Madrid as Angel Correa scores for Atletico.
Joao Felix with an assist there.
Throw-in for Granada at Wanda Metropolitano.
In the minute 49, Yannick Carrasco gets his shot on target but fails to score for Atletico.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards the away team a throw-in.
Atletico are pushing forward but Joao Felix's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 50, Granada have a goal kick.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Granada throw-in in Atletico's half.
Granada drives forward and Luis Milla gets in a shot. Without netting, however.
In the minute 54, Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a throw-in for Atletico, close to Granada's area.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
Granada drive upfield and Ramon Azeez gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Atletico defender.
In the minute 57, Granada have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Granada in their own half.
Saul Niguez is booked for the home team.
In the minute 60, Granada make their first substitution with Alberto Soro replacing Robert Kenedy.
Diego Martinez is making the team's second substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Darwin Machis replacing Antonio Puertas.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
In the minute 63, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Granada awarded a free kick in their own half.
In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the home team.
In the minute 65, Joao Felix puts the ball in the net and the home team extend their lead. The score-line now reads 3-0.
Angel Correa instrumental with a fine assist.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Atletico.
In the minute 67, Ball safe as Granada is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Throw-in for Granada in the half of Atletico.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 71, Luis Suarez is replacing Diego Costa for Atletico at Wanda Metropolitano.
The home team have replaced Joao Felix with Marcos Llorente. This is the second substitution made today by Diego Simeone.
Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a third substitution, with Thomas Partey replacing Yannick Carrasco.
In the minute 71, The away team have replaced Yangel Herrera with Fede Vico. This is the third substitution made today by Diego Martinez.
Yan Eteki is replacing Luis Milla for the away team.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez awards Granada a goal kick.
In the minute 72, Atletico take a comfortable 4-0 lead thanks to Marcos Llorente.
Great play from Luis Suarez to set up the goal.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a free kick to Granada.
In the minute 74, Thomas Partey (Atletico) gets a yellow card.
Atletico's Luis Suarez gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Ball goes out of play for a Granada goal kick.
In the minute 77, Diego Simeone (Atletico) is making a fourth substitution, with Vitolo replacing Koke.
Diego Simeone is making the team's fifth substitution at Wanda Metropolitano with Thomas Lemar replacing Angel Correa.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez signals a Granada throw-in in Atletico's half.
In the minute 78, In Madrid a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Free kick for Granada in the half of Atletico.
Throw-in for Atletico in their own half.
In the minute 84, German Sanchez is on a sub for Domingos Duarte for Granada.
Atletico move into a more comfortable 5-0 lead. Luis Suarez is the scorer with a header!
Marcos Llorente with an assist there.
In the minute 87, Goal! Jorge Molina pulls one back for Granada to make it 5-1.
Free kick Atletico.
Atletico awarded a free kick in their own half.
Xavier Estrada Fernandez will wait an extra 2 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
The fourth official's board shows 3 minutes, which will be added to the 2nd half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Renan Lodi for the home team is judged to be offside.
Darwin Machis of Granada smashes in a shot on target. The keeper saves, though.
Full-time! The final score is 6-1.
Goal! Atletico extend their lead to 6-1 through Luis Suarez.
